alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weber... south central Box Elder...northwestern Salt Lake...western Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Utah Test and Training Range North to 6 miles northwest of Stansbury Park. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stansbury Park, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Hat Island, Lakeside, Gunnison Island, Antelope Island State Park, Lake Point and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 76 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
